network-interface.help: Options are ETHERNET, WIFI_ESP8266, WIFI_ODIN, CELLULAR_ONBOARD

cellular-apn.help: Required if using the mbed-os generic cellular driver.  Please provide the APN for your SIM card; the one below is correct for a UBLOX_C030_U201 board which uses a chip SIM.

cellular-username.help: May or may not be required for your APN, please consult your SIM provider.  The value is a string and so it must be double-escaped like the cellular-apn value above.

cellular-password.help: May or may not be required for your APN, please consult your SIM provider.  The value is a string and so it must be double-escaped like the cellular-apn value above.

cellular-sim-pin.help: Please provide the PIN for your SIM if your SIM is locked.  The value is a string and so it must be double-escaped like the cellular-apn value above.

developer-mode.help: Enable Developer mode to skip Factory enrollment
